abstract: In a major change at the top of one Chicago’s white-shoe law firms, Jenner & Block has named Susan Levy as its new managing partner, replacing Gregory Gallopoulos, who will join the defense contractor General Dynamics.
lead_paragraph: In a major change at the top of one Chicago’s white-shoe law firms, Jenner & Block has named Susan Levy as its new managing partner, replacing Gregory Gallopoulos, who will join the defense contractor General Dynamics.

headline.main: Jenner& Block Names Levy to Top Post
